1017620.name: Wargroove - Soundtrack
1017620.description:
Purchase the Wargroove OST for access to the game's full soundtrack, composed by Phonetic Hero aka Pete Lepley. Phonetic Hero's tracks are stylistically versatile, bringing to life the vibrant personalities behind each of the Wargroove's Commanders and creating addictive tunes for every game mode.

The soundtrack contains 25 tracks for a total of 54:34 of play time.
1017620.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
